summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackThe ILIA Limitless Lash Mascara is an award-winning clean mascara that lengthens, lifts, and separates with a unique dual-sided wand.
details: DetailsBenefitsDual-sided brush - short bristles curl, long bristles separateNourishing, buildable formulaSafe for sensitive eyes + contact lensesFlake and smudge-resistantRemoves easily with warm waterMono-material tube reduces carbon emissions by 46% and waste by up to 20%**Compared to previous packaging, based on Life Cycle Assessment data from Bluebird Climate2025 Allure Readers' Choice Award WinnerKey IngredientsArginine + Biotin - Lash care heroes that help fortify + strengthen for healthier-looking lashesOrganic Shea Butter - Weightlessly conditions + adds a soft, flexible feelEthically Sourced Beeswax - Nourishes + defines without clumpingResearch Results100% said it lifts, separates, and defines lashes*97% said it doesn't smudge, flake, or crumble**95% said lashes look longer*91% said it nourishes and fortifies lashes***In a clinical study of 42 people after 2 weeks () and immediately (). In a 2-week study of 32 people ()Item 2629324How To UseFor extra lift, use an eyelash curler before applying. Glide the shorter side of the dual-sided wand through lashes to lift and define. Use the longer, comb-like side to lengthen and separate each lash. Apply more coats for a bolder look. To remove, rinse with warm water - no makeup remover needed.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D'Abeille*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba*, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Xanthan Gum, Arginine, Phenethyl Alcohol, Biotin, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Benzoic Acid, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxide). *Organic Ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For extra lift, use an eyelash curler before applying. Glide the shorter side of the dual-sided wand through lashes to lift and define. Use the longer, comb-like side to lengthen and separate each lash. Apply more coats for a bolder look. To remove, rinse with warm water - no makeup remover needed.
ingredients: Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba*

reviews.headline: Great mascara, but OUCH
reviews.comments: I was looking for a mascara that wouldn't smudge on my upper lids, especially in the Charleston humidity.  This mascara is great for that, but it STINGS when you wash it off and if it gets in your eyes. I wore it in the ocean once and I was dying!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: If you apply mascara with a couple of quick swipes and blinks, you may not get the full impact of this mascara.  However, if you don't mind taking a couple minutes to use this brush to its potential, this mascara is unmatched.  This gives me the longest, cleanest lashes of any mascara I've ever used. My lashes are lovely and fluttery and there's no irritation.  This does not stain the skin around my eyes, and it removes easily with my oil cleanser.  I love this long-lasting, gorgeous mascara.

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive eyes!
reviews.comments: I have been struggling to find a mascara that didn't irritate my eyes and this one is it! It does have a smell even though it's supposed to be fragrance free. Eventually I stopped noticing it. I will use this product again!

reviews.headline: Found my new mascara
reviews.comments: I've tried several natural mascaras (Burt's Bees, Thrive) and others have either been very clumpy or flaky. This Ilia is natural which makes me feel more comfortable and has the nicer appearance typically seen in the lab chemical options and is offered in brown which is great for the fair-haired crowd

reviews.headline: amazing mascara
reviews.comments: I was a hard they're real by benefit mascara user but I gave ilia a try when I saw something new was in at Ulta about a year ago and I have not looked back! this mascara is amazing. I get compliments all the time. even my eye Dr most recently at my visit asked me about my mascara and who was it by. the biggest draw back, I have to get a new one about every month when before I use to get my mascara about every 3 months.  I don't know if it's just me but it drys quickly and it's annoying. but I love my lashes and they always look amazing.

reviews.headline: BEST MASCARA EVER!!!!
reviews.comments: Im absolutely in love with this mascara i will not buy anything else!!! Dose not run or smudge. I look like i have fake lashes on they are so pretty. Definitely recommend trying this one. They have a little one in the sample place near check out if you dont want to try a full size.

reviews.headline: Best Mascara
reviews.comments: Love this mascara! It gives you length and volume without being clumpy. Totally worth buying!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Love the Ilia line. Hard to fine brown mascara, I love this shade.  It does not smudge which is very important to me.  And It's clean!

reviews.headline: Best mascara ever
reviews.comments: For longer lashes, this is the best mascara. Better than the idol from lancome

reviews.headline: I can finally wear mascara again!
reviews.comments: Finally a mascara that does not irritate my eyes, has great all day staying power, and looks very natural without flaking or clumps. Love.

reviews.headline: My only!
reviews.comments: This is the first mascara I have found that does NOT irritate my extremely sensitive eyes. Even all the others that are marketed toward sensitive eyes, left my eyes red by the end of the day. Replacing everything with this brand!

reviews.headline: Not For Me
reviews.comments: I think this is a nice mascara. I even like the wand. I wore it happily for most of the first day that I had it, and then my eye started watering and burning. Most mascaras I wear can handle my eye watering, even non-waterproof, which is all I can wear. This came right off my lashes and right into my eyes and burned them.

reviews.headline: Almost Perfect
reviews.comments:
TLDR: Mascara formula is great but the application wand sucks!

I am a mascara junkie. I've tried them all. And even waterproof mascara leaves me with racoon eyes for whatever reason, even if i dont apply the mascara to my bottom lashes! Like seriously, how does it get down there?! So when I was shopping for a foundation at a well known black and white striped store: the sales associate just happened to turn me on to Ilias Super Serum Skin Tint foundation. I was so excited to find a clean foundation that matched! Ok so whats this got to do with the mascara…. Well she then asked me about mascara and I told her I had just bought an expensive one last time I was in and told her all my woes with different mascaras. She then procedded to tell me about this mascara and promised I wouldnt have the same issue despite it not being a waterproof formula. So I tried it there in the store with a clean sample wand and it looked fantastic! I was so surprised! It gave great definition and length which is hard for my sparse eyelashes. I really liked it so then she told me about the wand in the tube and how the wand has one side for application and the other side of the wand is more of like a separator for your lashes. Of course my response to her was if it has a separator built into the wand, are you telling me that this mascara clumps, and she said no. So I'm kind of confused why Ilia even integrates this into its mascara wand. I do think that the brush for the mascara sucks because of this. The lash seperator side of the wand is very hard and it's hard to always tell the difference between it and the application side, but you will definitely feel it on your eyelash line as you apply it and for me it hurts a lot if I happen to use the wrong side. I almost always accidentally end up using both sides when I am applying the mascara because I twirl my mascara wand as I put my mascara on to make sure all my lashes are really coated well and if you hit the separator when i am at the base of my lashes it actually hurts my sensitive lash line. Now I read some reviews that said this mascara is so clean that it is barely visible and I think they are getting those results because they are not using the correct side of the mascara wand and they may not apply mascara in a twisting motion and more than one coat. I always apply two coats of mascara so my lashes are nice and full. So if you happen to apply the mascara with the side that's supposed to be what separates your lashes then you're not gonna get good application. If the sales associate had not told me and showed me the wand, I would have never known or noticed. This is the perfect everyday mascara if Ilia would just make the wand a standard wand instead of a dual one.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments:
This is a non-incentivized review. I spent my own $ bc I saw the brush and was curious. I'm a die hard mascara fan. I HATE the hassle of fake lashes. Money is legit not a factor for foundation and mascara for me and I would spend $100+ om a mascara if it did what I wanted it to. This does. I put one coat of Lancome Mascara primer on and let it dry. Then I curl my lashes with my Sheseido curler. Then I put 2 coats of this mascara on and I look like an absolute smoking hot bombshell. I'm 46, I've had 3 kids. I am confident in my body and appearance. This mascara gives me exactly what I want. Volume, definition, separation, length, thickness, blackness, and durability. I wear bone/cream shadow on my lids and this mascara does not turn gray as some do when coming in contact with light colored eyeshadows/concealers. 

Because I do mot like the hourglass shaped mascara wand bristles that the Volumizing formula has, they skip over my middle lashes and smudges in my inner corners so I wont even try it. But honestly there is no need bc this bush's two sides build and separate perfectly. 

Limitless Lash captures people's attention. It washes off easily. I wear waterproof eyeliner and the above-mentioned primer/mascara combination and my eyes are defined. While it is NOT waterproof, I do absolutely adore this mascara. 

The only drawback is what other reviews have mentioned: it smells soooo gross. It's almost like a hay/cow pasture, not even joking. I can smell my eyelashes sometimes and it makes me self conscious when I'm in an elevator or when I give someone a kiss. I love it so much that I don't even care anymore. If this is ever made in a waterproof unscented formula, people will probably never buy any other brand of mascara again. 

I am not gatekeeping this, I never want Ilia to stop making it.

reviews.headline: So clean, it's not even there.
reviews.comments: Im a die-hard Lash Paradise girl but have been wanting to find more eco-conscious alternatives for my makeup and skincare. I love Ilia's skin products and figured id give this a shot. All i can say is, it IS clean. SUPER clean. So clean it's like you aren't even wearing mascara. And at this price, I want my lashes to look borderline artificial. If you'd rather pay over twenty bucks to look like you skipped mascara, this is a great option, but personally I want a product that gives length, volume and color. This absolutely does not.

reviews.headline: Not the best mascara I have used
reviews.comments: This mascara is just ok. I feel like you can barely see it even after a couple coats. I had high expectations after seeing influencers rave about it. I think there are much better products than this one

reviews.headline: love this mascara but…
reviews.comments: this mascara is amazing and keeps my lashes looking full all day, only downside is that is smells soooo bad…

reviews.headline: I would buy this mascara again!!
reviews.comments: Love!!

reviews.headline: love this just not the smell
reviews.comments: this is my favorite and my go to mascara but i hate the way it smells. i dont even know how to describe the smell but it isnt good- for something marketed safe for sensitive eyes, the smell shouldnt be so strong. I can smell my eyelashes from time to time when i wear this mascara which is really weird.

reviews.headline: Best Natural Mascara - Barely There Look
reviews.comments: Best mascara I ever used for a natural barely there look.

media.headline: A must have for your lashes!
Perfect brown mascara that lifts and lengthens.
I never thought I would p

faceoff_positive.comments:
TLDR: Mascara formula is great but the application wand sucks!

faceoff_positive.headline: Almost Perfect

faceoff_negative.comments: I was so excited to receive this product from pinch me in exchange for my honest review. So here are My thoughts on this ilia limitless lash mascara. Let's start off with the packaging. It is very nice sleek simple tube with a silky matte feel. It feels of very good quality. The mascara wand doesn't do it for me. Im not that much a fan of plastic wands they just don't do much for my lashes which are stick straight and fine but hard to work with because there is an abundance of them. And the fact that there is different sizes on the wand to define, lift and separate was a no go for me. I like brush bristle mascara where all the bristles are basically the same size . The smell is funky I mean I know all mascaras have a chemically smell but this one also has a hint of floral to it...idk if that's what it is and maybe because it's something in there because its more natural idk but I smell floral and then chemical which doesn't smell nice. And even after a while if I turn my head a certain way you can get a faint whiff of the smell.  The formula to me is way too wet. I prefer dry as a bone like too faced better than sex waterproof mascara and this compared to that is like trying to curl my lashes with water.  It doesn't apply evenly ..it is very clumpy and it weighs down my lashes so much that they are just heavily coated straight sticks it looks awful. I tried 2 layers and that was a mistake I had to wash it off and try again the next day. And yes all the times I used this Mascara and I really gave it a lot of oppurtunies to wow me...I used a lash curler before hand. I will say that despite how heavily coated and droopy my lashes were they didn't feel heavy at all it felt pretty weightless almost like nothing was on them which some people really like. I like to be able to feel my mascara though like when it dries down it becomes hard not soft like this one. It's clearly not a waterproof mascara so if you touch your eyes or rub on the lashes at all it will all come off everywhere.  Now I did leave this Mascara on for a good 6 hours because that's all I could handle and it was a mess. It was on the bottom of my eyes because of sweat and oil and it was flaking off. Maybe this product could work for someone who already has pretty curly long thick lashes and they just want to use this for a little extra lengthen on a natural makeup day but for someone who needs alot of help with curling and lengthening and volume this did not help me out at all.  My lashes just did not agree with this formula  and that is perfectly okay because what works for one person may not work for the next.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me
